Community Waste Disposal has cancelled trash and recycling services for Tuesday, January 27.](https://www.corinthtx.gov/administration/page/cwd-collection-service-update)

CORINTH TRANSITIONS TO .GOV DOMAIN
The City of Corinth has officially transitioned its website and staff email addresses to a .gov domain.](https://www.corinthtx.gov/administration/page/corinth-transitions-gov-domain)

CORINTH POLICE DEPARTMENT ANNOUNCES PROMOTION OF CAPTAINS JIMMIE GREGG AND JESSE HUNTER TO DEPUTY CHIEF
The City of Corinth is proud to announce the promotion of Captain Jimmie Gregg and Captain Jesse Hunter to the rank of Deputy Chief with the Corinth Police Department.](https://www.corinthtx.gov/police/page/corinth-police-department-announces-promotion-captains-jimmie-gregg-and-jesse-hunter)
